message: It seems you understand the situation...For your information, I have dropped in unannounced to my stepdaughters Junior High school to pay some fund raising money she wound up eating 30 candy bars that she was supposed to sell. Anyhow the teacher in charge of the fund raising was baby sitting 30 + misfits who were kicked out of their classes for acting defiant. (and no my daughter is not in that class), The teacher in charge immediately yelled, """"Shut up all of you!"""". A miracle, it was so quiet I could hear myself breathing. So, brats yes, have to be yelled at when they are screaming.

JosephAdame Obama IS muslim homes! Trump is not a nazi, he supports Israel to the fullest, his daughter is Jewish convert, and he is not a racist, he is only gonna deport illegal criminal immigrants, again your confused and brainwashed homie, serio side.

The media wasn't unbiased when our Founding Fathers approved the First Amendment. They were very partisan and stood for causes - much like newspapers in the UK today.

You are a racist because you couldn't take a selfless act by a great young man, something this country is lacking severely in all colors, for face value. You took something great and tainted it with stereotypes and vitriol and wasted a good part of your morning doing it. That's what makes you a mental racist. I'm sure your business is thriving considering you have so much time to waste away from it online.
